resources.string: Configure notification panel elements, background color.
Configure UI elements.Lets you change preference of UI elements.
Pick the statusbar quicksettings toggle color
Set quicksettings profile picture and name
Set wallpapers of your choice from this beautiful collection

You are not on Gingerbread. This can create problems.

Not being on Gingerbread will lead on numerous FCs like Wallpapers, Utilities, Lockscreen Settings, etc.

 And it is an useless app if you are not on my Cosmic Theme. I am not responsible for anything that goes beyond this screen. You have had your warning. Do you not agree?
Q. How to change status bar and notification drawer color?
A. Go in the Mods>UI Settings, And choose Staus Bar or Notification Panel as you wish and change their colour using the Colour Dialog
Q. Some utilities Force Close. Why?
A. Your ROM doesn\'t have these required files. Use Simplicity v5 for best results
Q. When I want to change the wallpaper, screen flickers. What to do?
A. Change Font Size to Normal
Q. I can\'t hear awesome music on earphones. WHY?
Q. It doesn\'t work on CM?!?!?!
A. You went full retard. Never go full retard
Q. This is fake. I can\'t install Jelly Bean Apps!!!
A. See the answer of above question

Cosmic is a Jelly Bean theme or S-ROM made by Areeb Jamal mainly for Simplicity v5. It not only replicates Jelly Bean 4.3, but also adds a quite useful features in the phone and changes the UI in never seen before way. And with it\'s version 3, it\'s set to give it\'s users a Cosmic Experience.

Changelog


•Completely revamped Settings App
•New Messaging App with awesome theming.
•Music App look changed
•Jelly Bean Easter Egg
•All images optimised for smoother experience
•Status Bar Icons resized for even and clean look.
•On/Off Buttons changed to Jelly Bean Style
•Title bar changed to Simpler previous look
•Several Items added in Settings Menu
•Cosmic Hub in a new avatar
•Revamped the ROM Center aka Lidroid Parts.
•Improved Battery % Size
•SEVERAL framework update and fixes
•Extended Power Menu with 5 options added.
•Many more features looking for you to find them

Cosmic Hub is a ROM Control app built from source. It is built from ground using the codes from the open source Evo Modificaziones app. Several other thing like Wallpaper Support, Revamped About Section, Dynamic Action Bar, etc was added afterwards by iamareebjamal. The app provides a hub to:

Mods
Wallpapers
Utilities
Shortcuts
FAQ
etc

Areeb Jamal (iamareebjamal) is a 17 year old student from India.

Areeb started exploring the depths of Android world through XDA since August 2012. XDA gave him almost all his knowledge and he too, has not fallen short to give XDA back some contribution.

Currently, Recognised Contributor and Recognised Themer on XDA, Areeb seeks forward to give XDA more than what it has given to him. From theming to ROM Cooking and a little modding, Areeb has provided some considerable works for end users on XDA. And with some simple and useful guides, he has also made people contribute more.

Nevertheless, he finds it difficult sometimes to snatch some time for XDA between his studies and leisure life, he always hopes he could do better than ever he has done.
